channel.title: *HELP with 317 GE..Changing Object ID?*
channel.description:
*Ok*
so i am using butters dream source, and i was editing it and i didn't know how to change the object ID of the GE..
what i mean is, the butterscape source [317 GE] is a Bank Deposit Box. how can i change this? does anyone have any ideas? i've searched everywhere but i can't find anything..[in my source files]
*USED search bar..so don't post 'oh use the search bar' *USED www.google.com..DONT POST THAT EITHER..
just please help..heres a pic..if ya need it ;)
[IMG]http://i661.photobucket.com/albums/uu331/deathlyags/helpmeh.jpg[/img]
AGAIN: i just wanna change the item ID from bank deposit box to something else..PLEASE PLEASE reply back ;) thanks! -Sherman

item.title: *HELP with 317 GE..Changing Object ID?*
item.dc:creator: @ModAssassin ModAssassin
item.description:
@ModAssassin wrote:

[quote=“ar-temi-s, post:3, topic:283074”]This is very simple. Open up client.java and search for

public void NewObjects() {

Under it you should see somthing like

makeGlobalObject(3084, 3490, 2561, -4, 10); // Stall makeGlobalObject(3084, 3495, 2562, -4, 10); // Stall makeGlobalObject(3090, 3512, 2213, 0, 10); // Bank makeGlobalObject(3085, 3512, 2213, 0, 10); // Bank makeGlobalObject(3092, 3506, 6552, 0, 10); // Magic Alter makeGlobalObject(3095, 3500, 411, 0, 10); // Alter makeGlobalObject(2389, 3428, 2213, -3, 10); // Bank makeGlobalObject(2389, 3427, 2213, -3, 10); // Bank makeGlobalObject(2381, 3425, 2213, 0, 10); // Bank makeGlobalObject(2380, 3425, 2213, 0, 10); // Bank

Not the same but close to it.

how to change it?

Simple.

	       makeGlobalObject(XCoord, YCoord, ObjectId, facing, 10);

Facing meaning if the front of the object is facing West South North or East.

Which number is which side? here ya go. 

// FACE: 0= WEST | -1 = NORTH | -2 = EAST | -3 = SOUTH

Hoped this helped you![/quote]

i know all that stuff…but when i CHANGE it to another object…it don’t work >.<…just guna keep it the same i guess.

Read full topic

item.title: *HELP with 317 GE..Changing Object ID?*
item.dc:creator: @ar-temi-s ar-temi-s
item.description:
@ar-temi-s wrote:

This is very simple. Open up client.java and search for

public void NewObjects() {

Under it you should see somthing like

makeGlobalObject(3084, 3490, 2561, -4, 10); // Stall makeGlobalObject(3084, 3495, 2562, -4, 10); // Stall makeGlobalObject(3090, 3512, 2213, 0, 10); // Bank makeGlobalObject(3085, 3512, 2213, 0, 10); // Bank makeGlobalObject(3092, 3506, 6552, 0, 10); // Magic Alter makeGlobalObject(3095, 3500, 411, 0, 10); // Alter makeGlobalObject(2389, 3428, 2213, -3, 10); // Bank makeGlobalObject(2389, 3427, 2213, -3, 10); // Bank makeGlobalObject(2381, 3425, 2213, 0, 10); // Bank makeGlobalObject(2380, 3425, 2213, 0, 10); // Bank

Not the same but close to it.

how to change it?

Simple.

	       makeGlobalObject(XCoord, YCoord, ObjectId, facing, 10);

Facing meaning if the front of the object is facing West South North or East.

Which number is which side? here ya go. 

// FACE: 0= WEST | -1 = NORTH | -2 = EAST | -3 = SOUTH

Hoped this helped you!

Read full topic
